NodeFeature.description: numpy ndarray of shape (num_nodes, nodefeat_dim), where nodefeat_dim is the dimensionality of node features and i-th row represents the feature of i-th node. This can be None if no input node features are available.

NodeYear.description: Year of the arxiv paper represented by the node

NodeLabel.description: Label of the arxiv paper represented by the node

ID.description: ID of the edge, range from 0 to 1166243
